title: Has This Kolkata Bridge Developed Cracks? No, It’s Fake News
subtitle: People on social media are sharing a picture of a bridge near Axis Mall in Kolkata’s Rajarhat area claiming that the bridge has developed cracks and another tragedy is in the making. But it is fake.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
Well, not only is the picture fake, it is also an old one.

According to a report in The Telegraph, dated 9 February 2018, the picture is approximately two and a half years old.
